name: OR_LNLG_TOURN_TMS
description: This table contains the Tourniquet Times information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: TOURN_INFLATION_TI
columns.description: The inflation time of the tourniquet.

columns.name: TOURN_DEFLAT_TIME
columns.description: The deflation time of the tourniquet.

columns.name: TOURN_TOTAL_TIME
columns.description: The total time of the tourniquet.
